Description in English 
---------------------------------------
 Life, Above All is an emotional and universal drama about a young girl (stunningly performed by first-time-actress Khomotso Manyaka) who fights the fear and shame that have poisoned her community. The film captures the enduring strength of loyalty and a courage powered by the heart. Directed by South African filmmaker Oliver Schmitz ("Mapantsula", "Paris, je tÃ‚Â´aime"), it is based on the international award winning and best-selling novel "Chanda's Secrets" by Allan Stratton.
